TopicTitle: 0.23.5 Starting Parts Grand Tour science maximization with commentary (part 1 of 3?)

Articles.Content:
Changes that have been made to the game since my previous starting parts science maximization attempts (5528 points album) motivated me to give a first-launch science maximization mission another shot.

Do I manage to unlock the entire tech tree? You'll have to wait for part 3 to find out!

I have yet to record the audio commentary for the second (and possibly third) part of this mission, so if anyone wants a more detailed explanation about something, or would like me to address anything in particular, please post here and I will try to cover as much as I can in future parts!

Edit: The original video was cropped and squished because I forgot to turn on clipping during capture, but it's fixed now!

Edited May 10, 2014 by allmhuran
